Text: Nice script. Works just fine without problems. Thumbs up.
Activated Windows 8 Pro with Media Centre too. The only problem I've noticed is that once you activate Windows 8 Pro, you cannot upgrade to 8 Pro WMC. Other than that, good work.
Worked like a charm. Thanks so much

THANK YOU! I just did a fresh install, upgraded to WMC and then realized it was more or less a patch to prevent activation via KMS!

Anyways I stumbled upon this, ran it, my computer restarted, signed in, cmd ran for a sec, then everything popped up saying it was activated. :) __ I'll comment if anything changes.

Proof:
[IMG]http://i1023.photobucket.com/albums/af351/MrCrucifer/WMCWindows8Proof_zps4547e22f.png[/IMG]
This one worked for me when others either failed or every once in a while i would get a "activate required" screen.  This one did the trick though.  Thanks a bunch.

I tried using the activator and after restart it made my screen black and never loaded up my desktop or start page. I ran SFC /SCANNOW to fix the problem and then it restarted and never activated my windows 8 pro with media center. Wish it would of worked.

Thansk for this,

 I am not sure if this is working for me.

I have seen Windows is not activated in the system > properties.

Do someone know about it. I have successfully customized the start screen and watermark is gone.

Someone guide.
Worked for me; thanks Ashaar, job well done, cheers.
holy moly i have downloaded a lot of stuff but this has got to be the fastest download ever thanks :)

I downloaded it and it activated my windows 8 just fine but when I download anything I get disconnected from my internet and I have to change the port my wireless card goes into. Anyone know if that is a card problem or a windows problem?
Worked fine for me, thank you :)
